prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with a sleek white body and blue wing accents.
I want an aquatic bird Pokemon that soars gracefully above the ocean waves.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a seagull with a cheerful disposition and a love for the sea.
Make a water-type Pokemon that can glide effortlessly through both air and water.
Imagine a small bird Pokemon with a vibrant color palette and a playful nature.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of coastal life with a bright and airy appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of birds and water creatures in its design.
